summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons Special Housing Unit (SHU) review roster for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, dated July 19, 2019. It shows his status as 'Pending Classification' and indicates a review was due on July 28, 2019. The document was created nine days after his arrest and nine days before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Bureau of Prisons Special Housing Unit review roster, listed by his inmate name and registration number.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest and Initial Custody
events.description: The document lists this as the 'IA Date' (likely Inmate Admission Date) for Jeffrey Epstein, marking his entry into federal custody.

events.title: Scheduled SHU Review
events.description: A 14-day review of Epstein's status in the Special Housing Unit was due on this date, as indicated on the roster.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was held in the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Special Housing Unit (SHU) as of July 19, 2019.
His official inmate registration number was 76318-054.
His status was listed as 'Pending Classification' nine days after his arrest.
A review of his SHU status was scheduled for July 28, 2019, which was nine days after this document and one day after his death.
The document is a standard administrative form, indicating routine prison procedures were being followed for him at the time.
